item.title: Can any kind person plz help me!
item.dc:creator: @Ibehustlin247 Ibehustlin247
item.description:
@Ibehustlin247 wrote:

Simple, there are a few different KBD ID’s you must have put the one without the attack option onto your spot. If you go to moparisthebest.com and go to the login page look near the top of the screen and theres an option at the top something like help and NPC ID’s type in King black dragon and itll show all of the different ID’s for the KBD try each one and evetually youll find the one with the attack option.

Read full topic
